misc-unused-using-decls.description:
Description

Finds unused
using
declarations.

Unused
using
declarations in header files will not be diagnosed
since these using declarations are part of the headerâ€™s public API.
Allowed header file extensions can be configured via the global
option
HeaderFileExtensions
.

Example:

// main.cpp
namespace
n
{
class
C
;
}
using
n
::
C
;
// Never actually used.
misc-unused-using-decls.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
